overview:
Malcolm Taylor is responsible for managing and developing Accuityâ€™s business in Europe, Middle East, Africa and Asia Pacific. Mr. Taylor joined Accuity in 1999 and is based in our London offices where his role encompasses sales, marketing, data operations and business development. Under his management the company has successfully expanded its international business as a leading provider of online and integrated payments and compliance solutions, serving many of the worlds largest Financial Institutions and MNCs.

Mr. Taylor has over 20 yearsâ€™ experience in the reference data industry with a particular focus on the international financial services market. Prior to joining Accuity, Mr. Taylor spent 12 years with Reed Business Information, part of the Reed Elsevier Group plc. During this period, he served as Publisher, Marketing Director and Head of International Sales in a number of

business-to-business divisions including, media, legal and financial. These roles involved creating and implementing successful business development strategies to help grow these businesses globally.

Mr. Taylor was educated at Hamondâ€™s Grammar School and holds a B.A. in Business Management from Huddersfield University.
